name: masa
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of dough (= a soft food you can shape with your hands) made from specially treated maize, used for making tortillas, tamales, and other Latin American foods: Thrown on a hot griddle, the masa becomes crispy and the filling oozy. The masa encloses cheese and either a variety of vegetables or black beans and often pork. Compare
masa harina
cheche22/Moment/GettyImages
